notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription: Tranexamic acid, a drug useful against blood clotting, is prepared commercially from p-methylbenzonitrile. Formulate the steps likely to be used in the synthesis. (Don’t worry about cis–trans isomers; heating to 300 °C interconverts the isomers.)
